command.name: add-rule
command.abstract: add a rule to a filter

description.p: This command adds a rule to a filter. The rule will be added at the end of the sequence of rules of the filter. When a rule is added, two sub-commands can be used to define its predicate and actions. These sub-commands are matchbgp_router_peer_filter_add-rule_match and actionbgp_router_peer_filter_add-rule_action respectively.
